name: Galactic 123 3D Shoot Em Up Game
description:
In this 3D game for Windows (7 and above) you are a bounty hunter, hired to recover some artifact from an enemy pirate group. Needs keyboard and a mouse. Arrow keys to move and strafe, mouse to aim and shoot. Keys 1 to 8 to select a different weapon. 0 to hide it. SPACEBAR to jump. SHIFT to run. C to crouch. ESC to open game menu. Weapon 1 is an unlimited blaster. Some weapons such as sniper rifle and small machine gun have a secondary mode if you right click.

Installation: Open the ZIP file and drag the galactic123 folder to your desktop or place of choice (don't place it too deep into folders and subfolders, might experience a files not found type of bug). Double click galactic123 app file.

Game was created with FPS Creator, a very outdated engine. Any bugs present in the game are probably the same type of bugs present in other FPS Creator games. There is a game manual file included, both explaining how to play and any troubleshooting help. Did my best to optimize as much as I could. This is an old project that I never released, but now I'm sharing it with the world totally free. Requires DirectX 9 (details in manual) even if you have a newer version (both can coexist at the same time, though).

Tips: Save often while playing. During game press ESC to do it. Some pickups that look like pads will also autosave for you.

Credits: A.P., the FPSC Team, and OpenGameArt.
